analysis.description:
METAHASHCOIN.startDate (/unique_chucks/8/0x3659f2139005536e5edaf785e89db04ac4bf5987.sol#298) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/8/0x3659f2139005536e5edaf785e89db04ac4bf5987.sol#405-415)
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/8/0x3659f2139005536e5edaf785e89db04ac4bf5987.sol#276-279) is not in mixedCase
